about.title: About
about.subtitle: Endev - IT Partner, SMB and Startups.
about.intro: Our services are designed so that your business generates results and better serve your clients.
about.it_support_desc: Support for the entire spectrum of IT Issues including Hardware, Software, Network, Database Broadband, Website Issues.
about.custom_software_desc: Extensive background in the full life cycle development of IT business solutions across a broad spectrum of hardware, software platforms and business applications
about.web_dev_desc: Development focused on B2B and B2C in different technologies and industries.
about.infrastructure_desc: we help organizations streamline and modernize processes across complex IT landscapes.
about.security_desc: management and mitigation risk with our penetration testing and security assessment services
about.web_presence_desc: Your presence on the web creates a connection and improves the experience of your clients and collaborators.
